summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Public Utilities; authorizing the Director of Seattle Public Utilities to execute a Supplemental Lease Agreement with the U.S. Department of Transportation Federal Aviation Administration for a remote transmitter and receiver facility using approximately 13,500 square feet of the City's property located at the West Seattle Reservoir in the vicinity of 8th Avenue SW and SW Cloverdale Street in Section 31, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M., in King County, Washington.
